headline: J&J Explores $20 Billion-Plus Sale of Orthopedics Unit
summary: The business, known as DePuy Synthes, could be valued at more than $20 billion in a sale, the people said, asking not to be identified discussing confidential information.  J&J is assembling documents and financials for DePuy Synthes before it meets with possible buyers in the coming weeks, the people said.  Several large private equity firms are considering teaming up to potentially buy out the unit, they said.
